attributes.action: COVID-19: Reopening Beauty Salons in the UK on 1st of June
attributes.additional_details:
we propose to re-open on 1st of June by following health and safety measures for the public and employees like:
taking a limited amount of clients per time
all the clients can come by appointment only
the clients should use shoe cover when entering
the clients should disinfect their hands when entering the premises
the staff should wear masks, gloves and full face visor protector
the staff and clients will have temperature checked when coming
Sneeze Guard counter should be used where possible
attributes.background: The lockdown in UK started on the 23rd of March 2020 and Salon Owners and Beauty Industry Professionals have experienced many disastrous consequences. We want to be able to re-open as soon as possible with respecting all the possible Health and Safety measures.
